mapper.select: select top 50 Id, ParkingId, TokenType, StaffNo, StaffName, OutAutoPlate, OutTime, OutPicture, OutPicture2, OutPictureStaff, OutType, InAutoPlate, InTime, InPicture, InPicture2, InPictureStaff from OutVehicle where id > #{id}
select top 50 Id, ParkingId, TokenType, StaffNo, StaffName, InAutoPlate, InTime, InPicture, InPicture2, InPictureStaff from OutVehicle where id > #{id}
